item.title: #en @ 1504064644419362821
item.description: The CCP's social contract is simple - give up your liberty for security. We have created a world where that model can easily be adopted in democracies. Fear surrounding Covid made it appealing to the masses. Our open data model made the move seamless. We must think differently.

item.title: #en @ 1503434563699331073
item.description:
Open Data Protocol is a blockchain database that encourages social interaction and community engagement through crypto incentives.
Open Data incorporates social media concepts and development lessons of their communities. üë©‚Äçüíªüë©‚Äçüíª
#OPENDATAPROTOCOL $OPEN #Blockchain

item.title: #en @ 1503434267099119617
item.description:
Open Data Protocol flips the model and returns the value to the best contributors.
Users become platform stakeholders, keeping control of their data and earning money for each donation. üë®‚Äçüíªüë®‚Äçüíª
#OPENDATAPROTOCOL $OPEN #Crypto
